description: flag: document the zero value of FlagSet

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev, r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
http://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/12403043/diff/5001/src/pkg/flag/flag.go
File src/pkg/flag/flag.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12403043/diff/5001/src/pkg/flag/flag.go#newcode261
src/pkg/flag/flag.go:261: // error handling.
instead, say what the zero value means: ContinueOnError and no name specified.
also fix the (one?) place FlagSet.name is used to behave well if the name is empty.

Thanks, PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/12403043/diff/5001/src/pkg/flag/flag.go
File src/pkg/flag/flag.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12403043/diff/5001/src/pkg/flag/flag.go#newcode261
src/pkg/flag/flag.go:261: // error handling.
On 2013/08/03 07:44:25, r wrote:
> instead, say what the zero value means: ContinueOnError and no name specified.
> also fix the (one?) place FlagSet.name is used to behave well if the name is
> empty.

Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6294f3ca30e1 ***
